data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Crottini, Angelica, Glaw, Frank, Casiraghi, Maurizio, Jenkins, Richard K. B., Mercurio, Vincenzo, Randrianantoandro, Christian, Randrianirina, Jasmin E., Andreone, Franco (2011): A new Gephyromantis (Phylacomantis) frog species from the pinnacle karst of Bemaraha, western Madagascar. ZooKeys 81: 51-71, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.81.1111, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.81.1111
